info.author: Julien Tanay
info.description:
========
Overview
========



**Note: This is a very alpha release. API is subject to major changes.**

Python library for interacting with Avid Systems.

Currently focused on the Avid Interplay platform (tested against Avid Interplay WS >= 3.0.5). It comes bundled with a CLI to make simple calls to Avid Interplay.

Under the hood, using mostly `suds-jurko <https://bitbucket.org/jurko/suds>`_ and `click <http://click.pocoo.org>`_ for the CLI.
info.name: avid.py
info.summary: Python library for interacting with Avid systems.
info.html_description:
Note: This is a very alpha release. API is subject to major changes.

Python library for interacting with Avid Systems.

Currently focused on the Avid Interplay platform (tested against Avid Interplay WS >= 3.0.5). It comes bundled with a CLI to make simple calls to Avid Interplay.

Under the hood, using mostly suds-jurko and click for the CLI.
